description: This course provides practical information specifically relevant to the field of visual arts and art education. Students learn basic concepts about child growth, developmental stages, learning styles and varied classroom approaches. They participate in classroom observations and practical applications of classroom activities, prepare units of instruction and micro-teach. Topics include arts advocacy, interdisciplinary instruction, assessment and teaching art history. Spring Semester only.
name: Teaching of Art, K-12
title: Teaching of Visual Art, K-12
